survey_response.review_text:
We consulted Dr Shah for my mother who is 67 years old. She was suffering from acute knee pain and was very scared to go for operative procedures. She had a history of spine operation performed in 2012. Due to which she was worried abt immobility post operative procedures. We were advised to consult DR shah through a very close friend Dr Rahul Shah. Who was very confident abt Dr siddharth shah.

During our first consultation Dr shah made my Mom understand each and every aspect of the surgery and her recovery procedures. Through which she got all the confidence which was required and she finally agreed to go for the surgery. As the pain was acute and knee replacement was required in both her knees we decided to perform both knee replacement together as proposed by Dr Shah. 

The operation was scheduled within next 4 days of the 1st consultation. Mom got admitted and every detail about the operative cost and procedure of the Insurance was clealry told to us by the Hospital management, also they made sure that every thing was hassel free.

On the schedule day of the operation which was to start at 8.30 am Dr shah briefed us abt the operative time and procedure, also he breifed us about the robotics procedure that was suppose to be performed. Since the operation was for both the knees time taken for the operation was around 8.00 hours. Around 4.30 Mom was shifted back to the ward. Where she was seemed to be relaxed. At 5.30 the same day Dr Shah visted her and asked to stand, we were shocked as it was just one hour post operation, but he was very sure, and mom stood nd took few steps. We were all very relived. During our 4 days stay at the hospital regular physiotherapy sessions were conduted under the guidance of Dr Shah. We left hospital on 5th day with Mom having a new confidence in her, walking on her own without a wheel chair.

Its been a month and half now, the recovery is very good, mom is able to do her daily chores. She has even started going out without any help. All thanks to Dr Siddharth Shah. I see a new confidance in her which she lacked prior to her surgery. 

I would higly recommend Dr Siddharth Shah, as i feel he is the best in his field, a very soft spoken personality and confident about his work.

Thank you Dr Shah for all the efforts you took to convience Mom and made her reliase that its worth taking the risk than suffering from pain.

My father aged 89 years had an unfortunate fall at home and broke his femur near the hip. Our family doctor whom we completely trust and go to for advice on all medical issues immediately recommended Dr Siddharth Shah. Dr Shah was very clear with his diagnosis. At the same time he was very patient and explained the specific issue with us and the mode of treatment going forward. Since it was an issue requiring immediate treatment he organised for the procedure to take place on a holiday at the hospital. I am sure the timeliness of the operation helped in ensuring better recovery for my father. In these COVID times with all hospitals taking extra care and restricting meetings between patients and their relatives, Dr Shah took extra effort in explaining to the nursing team to ensure proper care and attention to be given to my father in our absence during his stay at the hospital. Further, even for meetings, Dr Shah would come down and meet us in the lobby of the hospital to assuage all our apprehensions regarding my father’s condition and his progress. He would promptly and clearly respond to all clarifications sought on Whatsapp. Finally the proof is…my father is noticeably getting better and we are grateful to Dr Shah for his treatment.

The doctor was very reassuring even while warning us of the risks associated with the surgery.  On request, he shared how the head of femur was replaced with an implant.  He, along with his colleagues, ensured that the patient walked again the very next day after surgery. He has been very encouraging about resuming a full life similar to pre-fracture days

He is always very prompt in responding to queries on WhatsApp, and made arrangements for his juniors to attend to the patient when we came into the Emergency ward after the fracture

My father's age is 82. For the last two years he is badly suffering from pain on both knees.

Due to old age we were not confident to do Knee replacement surgery. As we have consulted 2-3 orthopaedic surgeons, not satisfied with the solutions. Dr Siddharth Shah was referred by our family doctor, firstly he had investigated all the reports as father was suffering from other health issues. He explained everything about the surgery and eased us that there will be no issues after the operation.

Within two months, my father had the knee replacement surgery successfully. I am very happy & proud to say about Dr. Siddharth Shah's excellency, confidence & treatment.

I would recommend Dr. Siddharth Shah for any type of orthopaedic problems.

Soothing, friendly, assertive, comforting, pleasant personality, in depth knowledge, explains in details, goes out of the way and always ready and available to help the patient, even on the phone. Dr Siddharth  replaced both my knees simultaneously on 1st of June,, discharged from  Raheja Hospital on 5th, stitches  removed on 15th and by 20th  I was comfortably  mobile, and climbing up and down  the stairs. He was and always is in communication for any help and guidance. He is a blessing to the profession and patients. God Bless him.

I am suffering from a very painful labral tear in the shoulder . very patiently he is guiding me. Has not jumped to surgery. He is doing all efforts to avoid surgery hence his genuinity reflects. Very soft spoken and down to earth. Easily accessible. Prompt is reverting. Extremely happy with his line of treatment. 
My mother had a fall.... at 8.20 am Dr. Shah responded to my calls and msgs and immediately was available to treat her at 12 noon at Kikabai Hospital, Sion.
Seeing my experience my friend also shifted to Dr. Shah for his cervical issue .

We went to Dr. Siddharth Shah for my mom's acute knee problem who was 66 years old. Doctor was very approachable, understanding and convinced mom to undergo for total knee replacement surgery.Under doctor's supervision and expertise, moms operation was successful and now her right knee has recuperated completely. We thank the doctor profusely for successfully conducting mom's joint knee replacement surgery and would highly recommend others suffering from knee and joint problems to approach Dr. Shah as it's a worth visit from our personal experience...

I had been suffering from knee pain for last couple of years and an MRI showed that the cartilage on both knees were worn out causing friction and resultant pain. My general physician suggested I visit Dr Siddharth M Shah who is a hip & knee joint replacement surgeon in S. L. Raheja Hospital.

Dr. Shah was extremely polite and professional and explained to me the need for a total knee replacement surgery and also the risks involved due to obesity. 

Despite the hurdles faced due to excess weight, Dr Shah operated on me and has treated me with the greatest care, professional expertise and compassion. I am grateful to be his patient  and highly recommend him.

I strongly recommend Dr.Siddharth Shah for surgery,My Mom was admitted for Total Knee Replacement for both the legs,and to our surprise Doctor made her stand on her legs on the day after operation and also with walker she could walk from next day itself,He is very simple down to earth and also answers to all your queries.Really appreciate his efforts for each and every patient,and the best part was the Operation for both legs were done under one local Anesthesia itself for both the knees at the same time and he also uses special computerized  Technology so measurement of both the legs which were bent can be done straight as much as possible.

Once again I strongly recommend Dr.Siddharth Shah for knee replacement,** ** *** **** ** *** ***** ** *******

One word I can say for Dr. Siddharth Shah is perfect- a perfect and professional doctor who makes you so comfortable. He operated on my MIL for  her both knees replacement. Right from 1st appointment he has been so understanding, answered all our queries patiently. My MIL is now finally pain free. Thank you for all your help Dr. Siddharth.

Dr Sidharth Shah and his medical team are at the highest standards of medical and surgical care. His skill, warmth and empathy towards his patients is really commendable. An extremely approachable doctor who took the time to talk to the family as well particularly in these difficult pandemic times . My father went through a high risk shoulder fracture surgery and is recuperating well thanks to Dr Shah and his team. Thanks and regards

Dr. Siddharth Shah is very good. He explained me each and everything about knee replacementsurgery so it was easy for me to choose the best treatment. I am recovering well and it's all his support and efforts. I will recommend him to whoever wants to opt for knee replacement.
He sits in Raheja they have all advance technology and machinery.

Dr. Shah did knee replacement surgery of my sister at Raheja Hospital. He did this operation very nicely and gave correct advises during Pre and Post operation. He gave extra time to answer all our questions and is very helpful post operation for steady recovery. He is very gentle person and a patient never feels a tension when he is advising you. Thank you Dr. Shah.

Dr. Shah is specialist in knee replacement.  A very professional  confident on his own field and after seeing me immediately with all pros and cons convinced me to do the operation immediately.  His speciality is  he does computer assisted operation which is very accurate. Operation was smooth and recovery is extremely good. My decision was definitely right. Total  Operation time was 3 hrs The day of the operation they started me walking. Its a good team work and I will definitely recommend patients suffering for the same should go to him

Had my Right knee replacement surgery done in Raheja Hospital under Dr Siddharth Shah, very friendly, properly explained the entire procedure, the operation went very well, within 1 month I was jogging and taking a morning walk without any pain.
************* *** ********* each and every aspect of the treatment i.e. end to end was addressed with utmost care and now the patient is very much happy post surgery.
**** ****** *** **** *********** ********** ****  kind and very attentive with every patient and relatives ... Very supportive and friendly.. 👍

Dr Sidharth shah is best experienced orthopedic all modern technology with humble behavior my sister in law has done knee surgery 15days back she's walking with stick at home he is caring always answering with positive
************ ** ** ********* *******..he listen to d patient very calmly and gives perfect advice.this helps in reducing d fear.** ***** ** ** * **** ** *** *******

review_reply.reply_text: Thank you Sweta Shah for your kind words. Your feedback is extremely valuable in our relentless pursuit to deliver high quality patient care.

survey_response.review_text: The doctor is very friendly. He gave satisfactory answers to all our questions . He also gave us genuine advice to our problem. **** *** ********* ** ********** **** ****** **** **** ** **** ******
